description: [Astaroth](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0373) loads its module with the XSL script parameter vShow set to zero, which opens the application with a hidden window. (Citation: Cybereason Astaroth Feb 2019)

external_references.description: Salem, E. (2019, February 13). ASTAROTH MALWARE USES LEGITIMATE OS AND ANTIVIRUS PROCESSES TO STEAL PASSWORDS AND PERSONAL DATA. Retrieved April 17, 2019.
